name: Lab 03 Yrinth
description: Lab 03 Yrinth is a challenging maze game in a sci-fi scary atmosphere. It will challenge your skill and patience. Its a game made for speedrunners, be a guinea pig and have a taste of what it feels like...
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX Compatible Video card Storage: 800 MB available space
